DoaObject - Class in com.doa.engine
Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will get updated at every logical frame and will get drawn on the screen must sub-class this class, then it is ensured by DoaEngine that it will be updated and will be drawn on the screen.
